name: Customer Service: Variable-Driven Scenarios
description: Customer service training scenario demonstrating variable interpolation, conditional responses, and dynamic feedback based on performance tracking

variableDefinitions.name: Service Approach
variableDefinitions.description: Current service approach: professional, empathetic, or solution-focused

variableDefinitions.name: Issue Complexity
variableDefinitions.description: Complexity of current issue: simple, medium, or complex

variableDefinitions.name: Customer Mood
variableDefinitions.description: Customer's emotional state: frustrated, neutral, or satisfied

variableDefinitions.name: Call Duration
variableDefinitions.description: Duration of customer interaction in minutes

nodes.title: Customer Service Training: Dynamic Interactions
nodes.text:
Welcome to the customer service training system! This scenario will adapt based on customer satisfaction levels and your service approach.

**Training Overview:**
- Customer satisfaction tracking: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Your service approach: **{service_approach}**
- Agent name: **{agent_name}**

nodes.title: Incoming Customer Call
nodes.text:
**RING RING** üìû

You receive an incoming call. The customer seems {customer_mood} based on their initial tone.

**Call Information:**
- Current satisfaction level: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Issue complexity: **{issue_complexity}**
- Call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

How you handle this interaction will impact the customer's satisfaction and determine the flow of the conversation.

nodes.title: Opening Greeting
nodes.text:
Choose your opening greeting approach:

Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
Satisfaction level: **{customer_satisfaction}%**

choices.text: "Good morning, this is {agent_name}. How may I assist you today?"
"Hi there! I'm {agent_name}, and I'm here to help solve whatever's on your mind today."

nodes.title: Customer Explains Issue
nodes.text:
The customer explains their problem:

*"I've been trying to resolve this billing issue for weeks! My account shows charges I never authorized, and nobody seems to be able to help me."*

**Current Status:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Your approach: **{service_approach}**
- Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

The customer's frustration level is clearly elevated.

nodes.title: Your Response Strategy
nodes.text:
The customer is clearly {customer_mood} about their {issue_complexity} billing issue.

Satisfaction level: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
Your current approach: **{service_approach}**

How do you respond?

choices.text: "I completely understand your frustration, and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Let me personally ensure we resolve this today."
"I need to gather some information to help resolve this. Can you provide your account number?"
"Well, these charges might be legitimate. Let me check your account to see what services you're using."

nodes.title: Customer Mood Assessment
nodes.text: Based on the customer's current mood and satisfaction level, we'll take the most appropriate approach.

nodes.title: Escalation Protocol Activated
nodes.text:
**‚ö†Ô∏è ESCALATION REQUIRED**

Customer Status:
- Satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%** (Below threshold)
- Mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Service approach used: **{service_approach}**
- Call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes
- Resolution attempts: **{resolution_attempts}**

The customer's satisfaction is critically low. Following protocol, this case needs immediate supervisor attention.

nodes.title: Working Toward Resolution
nodes.text:
Great progress! The customer seems more receptive now.

**Current Status:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Your approach: **{service_approach}**
- Call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

You're successfully managing this {issue_complexity} issue. Let's continue with the resolution process.

nodes.title: Excellent Customer Interaction
nodes.text:
Outstanding work! The customer is responding very positively.

**Impressive Results:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%** (Excellent!)
- Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Your {service_approach} approach is working perfectly
- Efficient call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

This {issue_complexity} issue is being handled expertly. The customer appreciates your professionalism.

nodes.title: Resolution Implementation
nodes.text:
Time to implement a solution for this {issue_complexity} billing issue.

**Customer Status:**
- Satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Attempts so far: **{resolution_attempts}**
- Call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

What's your next step?

choices.text: "Let me do a thorough review of your account history to identify exactly where these charges originated."
"I'll process an immediate credit for these charges while we investigate."
"I need to transfer you to our billing department for this type of issue."

nodes.title: Final Satisfaction Assessment
nodes.text: Let's evaluate the final customer satisfaction based on our service interaction.

nodes.title: üåü Exceptional Customer Service!
nodes.text:
**OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE!**

**Final Results:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%** (Exceptional!)
- Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Service approach: **{service_approach}**
- Total call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes
- Resolution attempts: **{resolution_attempts}**
- Issue complexity handled: **{issue_complexity}**

You, {agent_name}, have delivered exceptional customer service! The customer is highly satisfied and the issue was resolved efficiently. This is exactly the kind of service that builds customer loyalty.

nodes.title: ‚úÖ Good Customer Service
nodes.text:
**SOLID PERFORMANCE**

**Final Results:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%** (Good)
- Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Service approach: **{service_approach}**
- Total call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

Well done, {agent_name}! You handled this situation professionally and achieved a positive outcome. The customer's issue was addressed and their satisfaction improved from the initial interaction.

nodes.title: üìö Learning Opportunity
nodes.text:
**AREAS FOR DEVELOPMENT**

**Final Results:**
- Customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%** (Needs attention)
- Customer mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Service approach: **{service_approach}**
- Total call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes

{agent_name}, this interaction shows areas for improvement. The customer's satisfaction level indicates we need to focus on:
- Better empathy and active listening
- More proactive problem-solving
- Improved communication techniques

Every challenging interaction is a learning opportunity!

nodes.title: Training Session Complete
nodes.text:
**TRAINING SESSION SUMMARY**

Thank you for completing the customer service training simulation!

**Your Performance Variables:**
- Final customer satisfaction: **{customer_satisfaction}%**
- Service approach used: **{service_approach}**
- Customer's final mood: **{customer_mood}**
- Total call duration: **{call_duration}** minutes
- Resolution attempts made: **{resolution_attempts}**
- Issue complexity handled: **{issue_complexity}**

**Key Learning Points:**
- Variable interpolation showed real-time feedback
- Branch conditions adapted the scenario based on performance
- Variable changes tracked the impact of your decisions
- Dynamic content personalized the experience with your name: {agent_name}

This scenario demonstrated how expressions and variables can create adaptive, personalized training experiences!
